About

Welcome to
our company

Amin Tannery Limited Started in Business from 1956. Amin Tannery Limited has been setting industry standards in the Bangladesh leather export industry science 1977, equipped with the state of the art Italian modern machinery and maintaining high quality strictness. Through the years, its production has been progressively entailing a constant expansion of building and machinery. Annual production Capacity 1500 million Sqft. and company sales turnover amounts yearly US$3,150 million, thus creating an exemplary model for corporate development in the tannery sector. This growth is a result of precise strategic decisions and constant improvements in the service of its customers. Which has led to its presence in the global arena plying an attractive role in the major leather markets of the world.

Message

Mr. Abdul Kader

Managing Director
Amin Tannery ltd.

Managing Director
Message

Mr. Abdul Kader, Managing Director of AMIN TANNERY LTD. He has able to put high Name in the Leather Sector as well as in the Bangladesh Business Area. He was Select Best Exporter in the Leather Sector in 2000. For the Special Achievement in favor of Govt. People Republic of Bangladesh Honorable Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina give him National Export Trophy (1996-1997). He also Ministry of Commerce Selected him Commercial Important Person (CIP) Until 31-12-2000. He was several times Sr. Vice Chairman, Acting Chairman of Bangladesh Finished Leather, Leather goods and Footwear Exporters Association (BFLLFEA). He was Former Managing Director of LEXCO LIMITED.

Achievement

People Republic of Bangladesh Honorable Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina give him National Export Trophy (1996-1997).
